Texts.Chs: 某人对于一根法杖的描述，或许这只是恶作剧。
Texts.Eng: A rather droll text all about one particular staff. It's quite ridiculous.

[page 854] - And then it was that I at long last assembled it from the Elder Tome, two Rune Wands and an Elder Artifact. My enemies shook in terror, for the staff I held was capable of might untold! I was invincible! And hungry. Popcorn? Yes. That seemed a reasonable...
